items.title: Is this top Senate recruit too old to run? Some Democrats think so.
items.description: Maine Gov. Janet Mills, 77, would be the oldest freshman senator ever. Her Tuesday campaign launch has prompted some criticism and reignited a debate ...

items.title: Who will lose out when ACA health insurance subsidies expire?
items.description: Here’s a look at who could be affected by the end of the Affordable Care Act credits and how much prices could change.

items.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene, tearing into her own party, says GOP men in Congress are ‘weak’
items.description: “There’s a lot of weak Republican men and they’re more afraid of strong Republican women,” Greene said.

items.title: For U.S. Palestinians, ceasefire brings long-awaited relief — and anxiety
items.description: A mother and wife in New Jersey dreams of a return to Gaza, but her family’s home will need rebuilding.
